name: Beholder (itch) (TheJunt, vfqd)
description:
Beholder gets progressively more difficult as you are more successful. Once the tentacles start spawning, you need to *balance* your attention between them. A tentacle that has had time to grow and embed itself is much harder to kill than a new one, so you'll want to make sure you don't let one get out of control.

WASD to move.
MOUSE to aim.
LEFTMOUSE to shoot.
